text: Ralph Wolfe Cowan (December 16, 1931 â€“ September 4, 2018) was an American portrait artist. He painted more reigning monarchs and heads of state than any artist in history. He was born in Phoebus, Virginia. Cowan died in West Palm Beach, Florida on September 4, 2018 at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American painters Category:People from Virginia Category:People from Florida
title: Ralph Wolfe Cowan
